content: AUCTION TERMSItem for Sale: 2021 Decimalisation 50th Anniversary Gold Proof One-Eighth Sovereign (Includes Book) Item Description: For sale is a 1/8 sovereign that was minted to celebrate 50 years since the British Pound went decimal in 1971. ¬†This coin is one of only 4,999 ever minted, and features Her Late Majesty, Queen Elizabeth II on the front. ¬†Included is a little book about decimalisation titled, "Britain's Second D-Day." ¬†Also, just a heads up, the coin was NEVER TAKEN OUT OF THE BOX IT CAME IN! ¬†This could increase its value!Images:https://ibb.co/m5PG3MRhttps://ibb.co/c2QMJRshttps://ibb.co/R7yzck5Bid Format:  BTCStarting Bid: 0.00649 BTCMinimum Bid Increment: 0.0002 BTCAuction End Time: Monday, October 9th, 2023 @6:01 PM ESTSniping:  10 minute standard sniping rule.Shipping: Paid for by buyer. Ships from USA. Buyer responsible for any and all customs/duties.Payment Address: 3LkXXrW5DPjy9VhMZCahbJQDL14eFG56FhPayment Due: Within 24 hoursEscrow: Available at cost of buyer and highly recommended, as this is my first auction.
